mainHero.subtitle: Are You a Student Athlete?
mainHero.description: Struggling with performance anxiety, low confidence, or stress that holds you back from reaching your full potential?

product.title: MindfulPerformance Accurately Matches Student-Athletes with Certified Mindfulness Coaches.

items.title: Student Athlete
items.description: Student-athletes want to work with coaches who understand their unique challenges and can help them overcome mental barriers to achieve success, but finding that perfect match has been difficult.

items.title: Mindfulness Coach
items.description: This is the only app mindfullnes coaches will need for their coaching business offering a streamlined path to expand their clientele and make a meaningful impact.

features.title: 4/4 Mindfulness Coaches surveyed expressed a keen interest in joining MindfulPerformance. 5/8 Student Athletes surveyed desire to join MindfulPerformance.
